description.value: Exhibitions held at the Glleries of M. Knoedler & Co. in 1913 and 1914, the Carnegie Institute in 1914 and at the Galleries of the American Fine Arts Society, 1915-1922.
Beginning with the 3rd annual exhibition, 1914, the exhibition circulated. Called circuit exhibition, 1915-
